sentences.sContent: He repossessed himself of his farm.
sentences.sCn: 他收回自己所有的农场。

sentences.sContent: He stroked the name of himself with his pen.
sentences.sContent_eng: He stroked the name of himself with his pen.
sentences.sCn: 他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。

sentences.sContent: ...Steve Jobs considered himself lucky to have been fired once by Apple...
...both for himself and the companies he has led...
...that poor guy! He really should shave himself every other day at least and put on something clean...
